title: PBE part 2

replies.body:
Okay, I got this!

1. There's no set amount of time it takes to get into the PBE. Getting chosen really depends on if you meet the criteria our team is looking for at the time. We typically send a batch of invites out when we're looking to test something and will typically look for players that will familiar with that thing we're testing. For example, if we're testing a new tanky support champ, we may send a batch of invites out to some Taric or Leona mains so we can get some great feedback!
____
2. You can get a better chance to get into the PBE by *actively* playing the game and being a *positive* influence on the community.

Check out our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) for more details on how we select testers and how the system works. Let me know if you have any questions.
What if my PBE status says "Go on, download the PBE launcher et start testing" on my account. But then I can't login because the PBE account is locked ?

It doesn't look like your account is locked, but since you're having trouble accessing it, you'll want to reach out in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

We'll be able to set you up with one of our account specialists to assist you in recovering your PBE Account. Let me know if you have any questions.

Well, I already sent a ticket, and someone answered it.
My PBE account is an old one, created before 2013. So it was locked when the new PBE account system was launched. So the account is locked and I cannot demand an access to the PBE since my PBE profile already says I can go on the PBE and test.

The support guy (or girl) said that my account was add to exceptions and I'll get a new PBE account soon. But it has been almost 3 weeks and I don't have any news about it. PBE acount still locked.

I spoke with our accounts team and mentioned it would be good idea to reach back out in your ticket so we can take a look at what's going on with this.

I hope that helps.

Hello,
Didn't receive any news since then. I tried to open a ticket, following the previous one that was closed, and no one answered during almost two weeks.
My PBE status still shows that I can download the client and test, my PBE account is still blocked.

I don't even know if I'm on the list of the PBE candidates or not.
